name: hampr
description: hampr is an on-demand, peer-to-peer laundry service that will pick up your laundry and return it fresh, folded, and back to your door the very next day.
one_liner: hampr is an on-demand, peer-to-peer laundry service that will pick up your laundry and return it fresh, folded, and back to your door the very next day.
